comments: Dr. Rakow is an excellent professor. This is a PhD level class and he does not spoon feed the students which, is obviously what others are expecting. If you pay attention, take some initiative to do what is expected, you will come out a better researcher and will appreciate the knowledge with which he has provided.

I agree, he was the worst teacher ever. I don\'t know why he is still teaching. He does not care about teaching at all and he is unprepared and not interested in students learning . He is also very mean to most students. When you go his office he treats you with disrespect. He is rude , and arrogant and only cares about his title of assistant dean.

He is a horrible teacher and so full of himself. He is not interested in teaching or helping students at all and it is so obvious he does not care about students learning the concepts .I was more confused in his class than before. He can not communicate the concepts very clearly even though he has some knowledge. and he is never available to meet
